49178.「どうやら 女神の黄玉石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようです。:
Apparently, the Yellow Goddess Gem was safely
offered to the River of Light.

49179.「さあ。女神に 祈りましょう。: Come on. Let's pray to the Goddess.

49183.<center>大いなる災い……\nその存在によって 魔瘴が\nアストルティアに:
A great evil... a demon miasma was brought to
Astoltia by its presence.

49184.<center>……そして 今は\n数百年ごとに訪れる 魔瘴の荒ぶりし時。:
...and now, every few hundred years, a demon
miasma rages.

49185.<center>この機に乗じ 魔族どもは\n大いなる災厄を呼びよせんと 暗躍を始:
Taking advantage of this opportunity, the
demons begin their dark deeds to bring about a
great calamity.

49186.<center>存続か 滅亡か……。\nアストルティアは 試練の時を迎えた。: Survival or extinction, Astoltia was on trial.
